DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a #yFire card, increase your #yFire #yAffinity by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon reaching 3 #yFire #yAffinity or more become #yHeated. Your #yFire #yAffinity is reset upon playing an #yIce card or at the start of your next turn.
Upon playing an #yIce card, increase your #yIce #yAffinity by the amount of the cost of the card played.
Upon reaching 3 #yIce #yAffinity or more become #yChilled. Your #yIce #yAffinity is reset upon playing a #yFire card or at the start of your next turn.
Clicking on this card in the #yDiscard #yPile will put it in your hand. This card then becomes #yEthereal and #yExhaust
Clicking on this card in the #yDraw #yPile will put it in your hand. This card then becomes #yEthereal and #yExhaust
